text: Mehdi Beneddine (born 26 February 1996) is a French footballer who plays as a defender for USM Alger. ==Club career== ===AS Monaco=== Beneddine made his debut for the AS Monaco B team aged 17 against Stade Montois on 24 May 2014. He came on for Morgan Kamin in the 83rd minute and he went on to make 46 appearances for the Monaco 2nd team. ====Cercle Brugge (loan)==== On 1 January 2017, Beneddine joined Belgian Second Division side Cercle Brugge on a six- month loan until 30 June 2017. Over one month later, Beneddine made his debut on 26 February in a 1–3 away win against Tubize, playing the full 90 minutes. ==References== ==External links== * Profile at Soccerway Category:Living people Category:1996 births Category:Sportspeople from Nîmes Category:Association football defenders Category:French footballers Category:French people of Algerian descent Category:French expatriate sportspeople in Monaco Category:Cercle Brugge K.S.V. players Category:AS Monaco FC players Category:US Quevilly-Rouen players Category:Belgian Second Division/Belgian First Division B players Category:Ligue 1 players Category:Championnat National players
title: Mehdi Beneddine
